[arelle:info.preferredLabelEmpty] (Info xbrl.5.2.4.2.1) Presentation relationship from us-gaap:SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpenseAbstract to us-gaap:SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense in link role http://www.aaghus.com/role/ConsolidatedIncomeStatement has empty preferredLabel http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/totalLabel - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1098009/000118518523001064/aagh-20230630_pre.xml 159

[arelle:info.preferredLabelEmpty] (Info xbrl.5.2.4.2.1) Presentation relationship from us-gaap:OtherIncomeAndExpensesAbstract to us-gaap:NonoperatingIncomeExpense in link role http://www.aaghus.com/role/ConsolidatedIncomeStatement has empty preferredLabel http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/totalLabel - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1098009/000118518523001064/aagh-20230630_pre.xml 173

[DQC.US.0167.10099] In the statement 001 - Statement - Consolidated Balance Sheets the filer has defined multiple root calculation elements. It is expected that the calculation tree in this disclosure is a single tree and not multiple trees. The existence of multiple tree's indicate that there is a calculation missing. The root element LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity has sibling root elements of us-gaap:Assets, us-gaap:LiabilitiesNoncurrent in the filing. The sibling element us-gaap:LiabilitiesNoncurrent should appear as a calculation descendant of LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity. To fix the issue a parent calculation element should be defined for the element(s) us-gaap:LiabilitiesNoncurrent to create a single tree. The element us-gaap:LiabilitiesNoncurrent is defined as calculation descendant of LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity in the US GAAP taxonomy.
Rule Element Id:10099 Rule version: 23.0.7 -
